Package net.fabricmc.fabric.api.loot.v1

Interface LootEntryTypeRegistry

@Deprecated public interface LootEntryTypeRegistry
Deprecated.
Use Registry.LOOT_POOL_ENTRY_TYPE from vanilla instead.
Fabric's extensions to LootPoolEntryTypes for registering custom loot entry types.
See Also:
  • register(net.minecraft.util.Identifier, net.minecraft.util.JsonSerializer<? extends net.minecraft.loot.entry.LootPoolEntry>)
